div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 131 Argos, 1967? Burial: early 3rd cent. B.C. Contents: 6+ AR Alexander III: 4 tetradr. (Pella, Sicyon, Ace, Babylon) Athens: 2 tetradr. Disposition: Athens 6 Oeconomides, A Delt 1968, Chronika, p. 12, illus.; 1969, Chronika, pp. 7-8, illus.
